text: Gumazitam God mɨnabɨ a ko navir vamɨra ikiamin ofan kam damusɨ ifongegh, an asɨzir ofan God mɨnabim inigh, egh uaghan yis puvatɨzir bretɨn taba sara ofa damu. Bretɨn kabar kara: plauan me olivɨn borem sara veregha ingarizir bretba, ko me olivɨn boremɨn aghuizir bisketba, ko olivɨn borer ekiam avarazir bretba, da inigh ofa damu.
